original_title: Local, foreign unpaid leave for Govt officials: Ministry
original_body_lines: Local, foreign unpaid leave for Govt officials without affecting seniority, pensions: Ministry  The Cabinet approved the granting of domestic and foreign unpaid leave to government officials without affecting their seniority or pensions, the Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government Ministry said.

The proposal was presented by Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena. The State Administration Circular 14/2022(III) dated July 13, 2023 was issued under the signature of State Administration Secretary K.D.N. Ranjith Ashoka. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
